title: Make homepage box text black

requirements.text: Update the Home page so the text inside the main content box section(s) renders in black (in light mode) while remaining readable in dark mode.

quotes: make the text in box black at home page

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the text within the primary boxed content area(s) (card-like container with border/rounded corners) is black when the site is in light mode.
In dark mode, the same text remains readable against the dark card background (do not force pure black in dark mode).
No other pages/components have their text colors unintentionally changed.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify immutable hook/bootstrap files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts).
nonGoals: Redesigning the Home page layout or typography beyond the requested text color change.
Changing global Tailwind theme tokens in a way that affects the entire app.
